verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: When] [ARG0: an fundamentalist preacher] [V: represents] [ARG1: the United States] [ARGM-LOC: at the dedication of a new diplomatic building in a foreign country] , the First Amendment is violated . For Donald Trump , this was a political payoff that did n’t cost a dime out of his own pocket .
